_header: Our wisdom this world has bereft
Subjects: sermons, verse in; Rome, example of; translations
_description: A tag in the Fasciculus morum regarding how war and famine overthrew Rome — four lines translating a Latin interpretation of an inscription

Bod187.Transcription:
Owr wysdam þe worlde haþ vs by raftepes of lond ye lost and
                    lafteþe kyngdom of rome ys for loreWith swerde hunger & fyr
                    þerfore

Bod410.Transcription:
Our wysdam þis world has by raftPees of lond is lost &
                    laftThe kyngdome of Rome be for loreWith swerd hunge & ffyr
                    þerfore

BodLauMis213.Transcription:
Oure wisdam þis world hathe by raviþPes of lond is lost and
                    lastÞe kyndome of rome beþe for loreWith swerd houngure and
                    fire þerfore

BodRawC670.Transcription:
[Oure] wysdam þis world haþ byraftPes of londe is loste and
                    lafteÞe kyndam of Rome betȝ for loreWith swerd hongur and
                    fuyre þer-fore
BodRawC670.Editions:
Wenzel,  Siegfried. 
             Verses in Sermons: ‘Fasciculus morum’ and Its Middle
                English Poems.
         Cambridge, MA: Medieval Academy of America, 1978: 169.

CamGon71.Transcription:
Oure wysdom þis world ous has be reftepes of londe is lost
                    kyndom of rome is for lornewyth swerd hunger & fyre þer
                    fro

EDU82.Transcription:
Owre wisdom this world hathe by raftPes of Londe is lost and
                    lastThe kyngdom of rome schal be for loreWyth swerde houngure and
                    fyure therfor

Lincoln44.Transcription:
Oure vuysdom þis world haþ by raftPes of londe ys lost and
                    lastÞe kyngdom of al rome schal be for loreWyþ swerde
                    hongure and sure þerfore

Spalding.Transcription:
Wysdame the warlde has reftPece of contre is lostthe kyndome of
                    rome is for lordeWith swerd hungre & fyre þerfore

WorcF19.Transcription:
Oure wisd[om] þis world hat byraftpeis of londe is lost &
                    laftþe kyngdum of rome schal for lorewit swerd hunger & fuyr
                    þer fore
